name: LocalDocumentTypes
title: Local Document Types
description: A custom code system for internal document types.

concept.display: Local code for Postpartum Summary Note  (known gap working on getting a LOINC code established)
concept.definition: A document used for summarizing the prenatal and delivery episodes of care.

concept.display: Local code for Behavioral Health History Note  (known gap working on getting a LOINC code established)
concept.definition: A document used for summarizing a patient's behavioral health history.
